attributes.action: Shipping 4000 BMWs for the BRITISH Olympic event
attributes.additional_details:
Bearing in mind the recent unpopular decision to award a German Company a train building contract to the detriment of BRITISH workers:
We the under signed urge the Government to intervene in the purchase and shipping of up to 4000 BMW motor vehicles for use by visiting dignitaries when there are sufficient British manufacturers who could supply these vehicles. This would ensure that money would stay in BRITAIN for The BRITISH Olympics

rejection.details: This is a matter for LOCOG.
